name: tengam (david kilmer)
description:
You were a happy little warehouse robot until your magnets malfunctioned. They won't turn off! But you're not going to let that stop you. No no. You're too clever for that. You'll find a way to get all those crates where they belong.

Tengam is a sokoban-like puzzle game with a deceptively simple magnetic mechanic. This is a prototype of the first batch of levels, and I'd love to hear your feedback.
